**A web-based AI assistant for Dungeons & Dragons**  
*Work-in-Progress — turning prep time into play time.*

---

## ✨ What Does It Do?

The **D&D AI Assistant** is a Python-powered chatbot that helps Dungeon Masters run streamlined sessions.  
Ask rules questions, roll dice, spawn NPCs, track combat, and even push tokens to your favorite VTT — all from one interface.

---

## 🧰 Current Feature Set

| Module | Status | Quick blurb |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| 🎲 **Dice Roller** | ✅ | Parses `2d20kh1 + 5`, advantage/disadvantage, and groups. |
| 🔮 **Spellbook Lookup** | ✅ | Instant SRD spell text, upcasting notes, and class filters. |
| 👤 **Character & NPC Generator** | 🔄 Alpha | One-click PCs or flavorful NPCs with quirks and stat blocks. |
| ⚔️ **Initiative Tracker** | 🏗️ Planned | Auto-sorted turns, HP bars, and condition badges. |
| 🗺️ **Map & Token Manager** | 🏗️ Planned | Grid movement, fog-of-war, and VTT sync. |
